txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Pinnacle of Orthanc

From the Pinnacle of Orthanc, Saruman of Many Colours -- once Saruman the White, greatest of the Wizards -- reads the stars and looks out over his domain. To face a Wizard is madness, but to face him and survive is a sign of true heroism.
